name: Cazoo Group Ltd.
description: Cazoo Group Ltd. is a leading online car retailer based in the United Kingdom, revolutionizing the way people buy used cars. Founded in 2018 by Alex Chesterman, Cazoo aims to make car buying as easy and transparent as possible. The company offers a wide range of high-quality used cars that can be purchased entirely online, with the added convenience of home delivery or a click-and-collect service. Cazoo’s platform is designed to provide customers with detailed information about each vehicle, including comprehensive inspections and a 7-day money-back guarantee. The company focuses on enhancing the customer experience by leveraging technology to simplify the car buying process, eliminating the traditional hassles associated with dealerships. Cazoo is committed to providing a seamless digital shopping experience, which includes features like virtual appointments and online financing options. With a vision of transforming the automotive retail landscape, Cazoo is rapidly expanding its footprint across the UK and into international markets, aiming to become a household name in online car sales.

seo.meta_title: Cazoo Group Ltd. | Buy Used Cars Online
seo.meta_description: Cazoo Group Ltd. is transforming car buying in the UK by offering a seamless online experience for purchasing high-quality used cars with home delivery and a 7-day money-back guarantee.

faq.question: What is Cazoo?
faq.answer: Cazoo is an online car retailer that allows customers to buy high-quality used cars entirely online.

faq.question: How does Cazoo's car buying process work?
faq.answer: Customers can browse cars online, select a vehicle, and have it delivered to their home or collect it from a designated location.

faq.question: What guarantees does Cazoo offer?
faq.answer: Cazoo offers a 7-day money-back guarantee on all purchases.

faq.question: Where is Cazoo headquartered?
faq.answer: Cazoo is headquartered in London, United Kingdom.
